name: Desolate Ship
description:
Desolate Ship is a horror/fps game that takes place in a space brig that has had a virus start to attack it, as you make your way through the levels you'll see the state of the ship slowly being taken over as you work towards the end.

Since the engine I was using was in early access when the first level launches it lags a little bit, also the last level will be hard to run regardless of your hardware I recommend turning down the graphics when you load into it. 

Uploaded a new version may take a few hours for the download to appear.

Average playtime is 25-30 minutes if you take your time and read all of the prompts and look for small secrets but I was able to speed run the game in 4 minutes if you want to push yourself for it./

This game took a total of 24.4 hours to make and it is also my first published game I would love to here criticism about it and where I could've done better. 

Recommended specs : Windows 10 or newer

                                                   16 GB Ram

                                                   Nvidia GeForce RTX 2080TI | Radeon 5700 XT

Video Devlogs coming to my youtube channel soon - https://www.youtube.com/c/Whitewolfgaming
